verses.verse: The transgression<WH6588> of the wicked<WH7563> says<WH5002> inside<WH7130> my heart<WH3820>, that there is no fear<WH6343> of God<WH430> before his eyes<WH5869>.
For he flatters<WH2505> himself in his own eyes<WH5869>, until his iniquity<WH5771> be found<WH4672> to be hateful<WH8130>.
The words<WH1697> of his mouth<WH6310> are iniquity<WH205> and deceit<WH4820>: he has left off<WH2308> to be wise<WH7919>, and to do good<WH3190>.
He devises<WH2803> mischief<WH205> upon his bed<WH4904>; he sets<WH3320> himself in a way<WH1870> that is not good<WH2896>; he abhors<WH3988> not evil<WH7451>.
Your mercy<WH2617>, O Lord<WH3068>, is in the heavens<WH8064>; and your faithfulness<WH530> reaches unto the clouds<WH7834>.
Your righteousness<WH6666> is like the great<WH410> mountains<WH2042>; your judgments<WH4941> are a great<WH7227> deep<WH8415>: O Lord<WH3068>, you preserve<WH3467> man<WH120> and animal<WH929>.
How excellent<WH3368> is your lovingkindness<WH2617>, O God<WH430>! therefore the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> put their trust<WH2620> under the shadow<WH6738> of your wings<WH3671>.
They shall be abundantly satisfied<WH7301> with the fatness<WH1880> of your house<WH1004>; and you shall make them drink<WH8248> of the river<WH5158> of your pleasures<WH5730>.
For with you is the fountain<WH4726> of life<WH2416>: in your light<WH216> shall we see<WH7200> light<WH216>.
O continue<WH4900> your lovingkindness<WH2617> unto them that know<WH3045> you<WH6666>; and your righteousness to the upright<WH3477> in heart<WH3820>.
Let not the foot<WH7272> of pride<WH1346> come<WH935> against me<WH3027>, and let not the hand of the wicked<WH7563> remove me<WH5110>.
There are the workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205> fallen<WH5307>: they are cast down<WH1760>, and shall not be able<WH3201> to rise<WH6965>.
